Spanish: Me encanta viajar a lugares exóticos durante mis vacaciones.
English: I love to travel to exotic places during my vacations.

Spanish: ¿Puedes arreglar la lámpara que se quemó en la sala?
English: Can you fix the lamp that burned out in the living room?

Spanish: Te sugiero que pruebes el nuevo restaurante italiano que abrió en la ciudad.
English: I suggest you try the new Italian restaurant that opened in the city.

Spanish: A los niños les agrada jugar en el parque los fines de semana.
English: The children enjoy playing in the park on weekends.

Spanish: Esa chaqueta te hace lucir muy elegante.
English: That jacket makes you look very elegant.

Spanish: Mis hermanas gemelas siempre se llevan bien entre ellas.
English: My twin sisters always get along with each other.

Spanish: Tengo que tener paciencia cuando las cosas no salen como esperaba.
English: I have to have patience when things don't go as expected.

Spanish: Mi hermano se enfada fácilmente cuando las cosas no salen como él quiere.
English: My brother gets angry easily when things don't go his way.

Spanish: El agua comienza a hervir cuando alcanza los 100 grados Celsius.
English: Water starts to boil when it reaches 100 degrees Celsius.

Spanish: Mi abuela siempre me decía que la honestidad es lo más importante.
English: My grandmother always told me that honesty is the most important thing.

Spanish: Disfruto mucho leyendo un buen libro en un día lluvioso.
English: I really enjoy reading a good book on a rainy day.

Spanish: Es inaceptable maltratar a los animales de cualquier manera.
English: It is unacceptable to mistreat animals in any way.

Spanish: Tu hermano rompió el jarrón de porcelana que estaba en la sala.
English: Your brother broke the porcelain vase that was in the living room.

Spanish: Ella se arregla muy bien para las ocasiones especiales.
English: She dresses up very nicely for special occasions.

Spanish: El tesoro yace oculto en una isla desierta.
English: The treasure lies hidden on a deserted island.

Spanish: A mi hijo le encanta jugar al fútbol en el parque.
English: My son loves to play soccer in the park.

Spanish: Este libro pertenece a la biblioteca pública, no lo puedo quedarme.
English: This book belongs to the public library, I can't keep it.

Spanish: El nuevo teléfono inteligente me costó mucho dinero.
English: The new smartphone cost me a lot of money.

Spanish: Por favor, cubre la comida para que no se enfríe.
English: Please cover the food so it doesn't get cold.

Spanish: Me mojé completamente bajo la lluvia torrencial.
English: I got completely wet in the pouring rain.

Spanish: Merecer una oportunidad es importante para todos.
English: Deserving an opportunity is important for everyone.

Spanish: Actuar en esa película fue un gran logro para ella.
English: Acting in that movie was a great achievement for her.

Spanish: Dormirse durante la película es algo que me sucede a menudo.
English: Falling asleep during the movie is something that often happens to me.

Spanish: Abordar el avión a tiempo es crucial para no perder el vuelo.
English: Boarding the plane on time is crucial to not miss the flight.

Spanish: Poseer conocimientos en informática es fundamental en la actualidad.
English: Possessing computer skills is essential nowadays.

Spanish: Envolver el regalo con papel de regalo bonito le dio un toque especial.
English: Wrapping the gift with nice wrapping paper gave it a special touch.

Spanish: Atraer la atención del público es el objetivo de cualquier campaña publicitaria.
English: Attracting the public's attention is the goal of any advertising campaign.

Spanish: Destruir documentos importantes es un delito grave.
English: Destroying important documents is a serious crime.

Spanish: Parar el coche en el semáforo es obligatorio.
English: Stopping the car at the traffic light is mandatory.

Spanish: Confirmar la reserva del hotel es necesario antes de viajar.
English: Confirming the hotel reservation is necessary before traveling.

Spanish: Trabajar en equipo es esencial para el éxito del proyecto.
English: Working as a team is essential for the project's success.

Spanish: Prometer algo y no cumplirlo es una falta de respeto.
English: Promising something and not fulfilling it is disrespectful.

Spanish: Notar cambios en su actitud me hizo sospechar que algo no iba bien.
English: Noticing changes in his attitude made me suspect that something was wrong.

Spanish: Escalar esa montaña fue un desafío emocionante.
English: Scaling that mountain was an exciting challenge.

Spanish: Dormir bien por la noche es importante para la salud.
English: Sleeping well at night is important for health.

Spanish: Vestirse adecuadamente para la entrevista es crucial.
English: Dressing appropriately for the interview is crucial.

Spanish: Aclarar las dudas con el profesor es fundamental para comprender la lección.
English: Clarifying doubts with the teacher is essential to understand the lesson.

Spanish: Velar por la seguridad de los niños es responsabilidad de los adultos.
English: Watching over the safety of children is the responsibility of adults.

Spanish: Elegir el mejor camino para llegar a tu destino es importante.
English: Choosing the best path to reach your destination is important.

Spanish: Atender a los clientes con amabilidad es parte del buen servicio.
English: Attending to customers with kindness is part of good service.

Spanish: Grabé el concierto para poder verlo más tarde.
English: I recorded the concert to watch it later.

Spanish: Ganó el premio al mejor actor del año.
English: He won the award for best actor of the year.

Spanish: Le ruego que me disculpe por el error.
English: I beg you to forgive me for the mistake.

Spanish: Te aconsejo que estudies para el examen.
English: I advise you to study for the exam.

Spanish: Probé el nuevo restaurante italiano y me encantó.
English: I tried the new Italian restaurant and loved it.

Spanish: Anunciarán la fecha del concierto próximamente.
English: They will announce the concert date soon.

Spanish: El camino zigzagueaba entre los árboles.
English: The path zigzagged through the trees.

Spanish: Corrige tus errores antes de entregar el trabajo.
English: Correct your mistakes before submitting the work.

Spanish: Me paré en la puerta esperando su llegada.
English: I stood at the door waiting for his arrival.

Spanish: Recibí una carta de mi amigo que vive en el extranjero.
English: I received a letter from my friend who lives abroad.

Spanish: Se quemó la comida porque olvidó apagar el fuego.
English: The food burned because he forgot to turn off the stove.

Spanish: Veo a mi hermana en el parque jugando con sus amigos.
English: I see my sister in the park playing with her friends.

Spanish: Publicaron un nuevo libro de poesía el mes pasado.
English: They published a new book of poetry last month.

Spanish: Pienso que es importante ser honesto en todo momento.
English: I think it's important to be honest at all times.

Spanish: No niegues la verdad, es mejor ser sincero.
English: Don't deny the truth, it's better to be honest.

Spanish: No me gusta mentir, prefiero ser honesto.
English: I don't like to lie, I prefer to be honest.

Spanish: El ruido repentino nos espantó a todos.
English: The sudden noise scared all of us.

Spanish: Fuma un cigarrillo después de cada comida.
English: He smokes a cigarette after every meal.

Spanish: Olvidé comprar leche en el supermercado.
English: I forgot to buy milk at the supermarket.

Spanish: Lograron vencer al equipo campeón en la final.
English: They managed to defeat the champion team in the final.

Spanish: Se retiró temprano de la fiesta porque se sentía cansado.
English: He left the party early because he felt tired.

Spanish: No te quejes si no estás dispuesto a hacer algo al respecto.
English: Don't complain if you're not willing to do something about it.

Spanish: Ella dirige una empresa de tecnología muy exitosa.
English: She runs a very successful technology company.

Spanish: El tren se demoró una hora debido a un problema técnico.
English: The train was delayed for an hour due to a technical issue.

Spanish: Mi abuelo se jubiló después de trabajar 40 años en la misma empresa.
English: My grandfather retired after working for 40 years in the same company.

Spanish: Vamos a medir la habitación para saber qué tamaño de alfombra necesitamos.
English: Let's measure the room to know what size of carpet we need.

Spanish: El cirujano va a operar al paciente mañana por la mañana.
English: The surgeon is going to operate on the patient tomorrow morning.

Spanish: Los hermanos pelearon por el control remoto de la televisión.
English: The siblings fought over the TV remote.

Spanish: El juez condenó al acusado a diez años de prisión.
English: The judge sentenced the defendant to ten years in prison.

Spanish: Vamos a juntar dinero para la obra de caridad.
English: Let's gather money for the charity work.

Spanish: ¿Puedo pagar con tarjeta de crédito o solo en efectivo?
English: Can I pay by credit card or only in cash?

Spanish: Me bajé del autobús en la parada equivocada.
English: I got off the bus at the wrong stop.

Spanish: No dudes en pedir ayuda si la necesitas.
English: Don't hesitate to ask for help if you need it.

Spanish: Voy a tratar de arreglar la lámpara antes de llamar al electricista.
English: I will try to fix the lamp before calling the electrician.

Spanish: Es importante ahorrar dinero para el futuro.
English: It's important to save money for the future.

Spanish: Los niños murmuraban en clase y la maestra les pidió silencio.
English: The children were whispering in class and the teacher asked them to be quiet.

Spanish: Me encanta bucear y explorar el fondo del mar.
English: I love to dive and explore the ocean floor.

Spanish: El médico va a examinar tus oídos para ver si hay alguna infección.
English: The doctor is going to examine your ears to see if there is any infection.

Spanish: Voy a hornear galletas para la fiesta de cumpleaños.
English: I'm going to bake cookies for the birthday party.

Spanish: El prisionero logró escapar de la cárcel durante la noche.
English: The prisoner managed to escape from the jail during the night.

Spanish: Voy a presentar mi proyecto de investigación la próxima semana.
English: I am going to present my research project next week.

Spanish: Los atletas van a competir en los Juegos Olímpicos.
English: The athletes are going to compete in the Olympic Games.

Spanish: Aprecio mucho tu ayuda en este momento difícil.
English: I really appreciate your help in this difficult time.

Spanish: Se está oscureciendo rápidamente, debemos irnos.
English: It's getting dark quickly, we should leave.

Spanish: Ella se va a maquillar antes de la fiesta.
English: She is going to put on makeup before the party.

Spanish: Prefiero el café con leche en la mañana.
English: I prefer coffee with milk in the morning.

Spanish: Voy a probarme este vestido antes de comprarlo.
English: I am going to try on this dress before buying it.

Spanish: Él parece muy cansado hoy.
English: He seems very tired today.

Spanish: Si no pagas tus deudas, te van a amenazar con acciones legales.
English: If you don't pay your debts, they will threaten you with legal action.

Spanish: Vamos a brindar por el éxito de nuestro proyecto.
English: Let's toast to the success of our project.

Spanish: El mal tiempo puede impedir que salgamos esta noche.
English: Bad weather may prevent us from going out tonight.

Spanish: Vamos a compartir la comida que preparamos.
English: We are going to share the food we prepared.

Spanish: Decidí confesar la verdad sobre lo que sucedió.
English: I decided to confess the truth about what happened.

Spanish: Después de un largo día, no puedo dejar de bostezar.
English: After a long day, I can't stop yawning.

Spanish: Ella estornudó varias veces debido al polen.
English: She sneezed several times because of the pollen.

Spanish: Vamos a almorzar juntos mañana en el restaurante nuevo.
English: We are going to have lunch together tomorrow at the new restaurant.

Spanish: No se permite fumar en este edificio.
English: Smoking is not allowed in this building.

Spanish: El jurado decidió absolver al acusado de todos los cargos.
English: The jury decided to acquit the defendant of all charges.

Spanish: Opté por estudiar medicina en lugar de derecho.
English: I opted to study medicine instead of law.

Spanish: Es importante prevenir enfermedades lavándose las manos regularmente.
English: It's important to prevent diseases by washing your hands regularly.

Spanish: El perro comenzó a gemir cuando se lastimó la pata.
English: The dog started to whimper when it hurt its paw.

Spanish: Voy a mostrar mi colección de sellos a mis amigos.
English: I am going to show my stamp collection to my friends.

Spanish: Vamos a partir el pastel en porciones iguales.
English: We are going to cut the cake into equal slices.
